steps.description: Serve with a small amount of syrup, cream, jam or other favorite condiments.

text: Whisk together dry ingredients.  Add milk slowly, beaten egg and melted butter.  Beat batter for 2 minutes and drop by spoonfuls onto a well greased hot waffle iron.  Bake until steaming stops.  Remove waffle from iron and keep warm until ready to serve.  Done. Serve with a small amount of syrup, cream, jam or other favorite condiments.
